title: The dark secret of being a new tech lead: You are now in charge of your friends
content:
This article was originally published on .cult by Neil Green. .cult is a Berlin-based community platform for developers. We write about all things career-related, make original documentaries, and share heaps of other untold developer stories from around the world. Becoming a tech lead is a tremendous accomplishment, and you should be proud to have been given that responsibility. Technology leadership is a stepping stone into management or architecture, so your career progression is on the right track. description: Being a new tech lead will push you to the limits of your leadership capabilities. Here's some advice to keep you on the right track.
